author: Yong Pung How CJ:
casename: Cheong Wai Keong v Public Prosecutor
counsel: Ramesh Tiwary (Edmond Pereira and Partners) for the appellant; Ravneet Kaur (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Road Traffic/Offences/Drink driving/Appellant pleading guilty to one charge of drink driving/Appellant driving from road to nearby car park/Whether fact appellant driving short distance and unlikely to come into contact with other road users constituting special reason to reduce period of disqualification prescribed by law/Sections 67(1), 67(2) Road Traffic Act (Cap 276, 2004 Rev Ed)
